messages.content: <video>Who grabs the ankle?
Do you mean the person wearing red or black?
the person in red
The person wearing red grabs the opponent's ankle.
<video>Who is at the net?
Do you mean the later close-up frames or the earlier wide shots?
Later close-up frames
The player wearing the light blue shirt at the net.
<video>Who hits the volley?
Do you mean the player in blue or the player in pink?
the player in blue
The player in blue hits the volley.
<video>Who is holding the ball?
Do you mean the frame with the small face overlay or the frame without it?
with overlay
The yellow-team player near the left baseline (the yellow player holding the ball).
<video>Is he standing or airborne?
Do you mean at the trick's highest point or after he lands?
highest point
Airborne — he's mid-jump while the skateboard flips.
<video>Who is being carried?
Which scene — the large wrestler carrying someone in bright pink trunks, or the red‑haired wrestler carrying someone over the ropes?
the large wrestler carrying someone in bright pink trunks
a wrestler wearing bright pink trunks is being carried
<video>Is the skater crashing onto the ice or executing a move?
Which skater do you mean — the one in the close-up near the camera?
Close-up skater
The close-up skater is executing a controlled low move and then recovers — not an uncontrolled crash.
<video>Who is on the floor?
Do you mean the player lying on the floor in the yellow jersey?
Yes — the player in yellow.
The player wearing the yellow jersey number 10 is lying on the floor.
<video>Who gets the rebound?
Do you mean the offensive rebound shown in the on-screen label?
Yes, the labeled one.
The player in the white jersey #24.
<video>What's behind him?
Do you mean far in the background behind him?
Yes — far background
an overpass (bridge)
<video>Is it orange?
Do you mean the golf ball on the ground?
Yes
Yes — the golf ball on the ground is orange.
<video>What does he put on the skateboard?
Do you mean the object he holds or his foot?
the shoe
a shoe
<video>Who is dribbling the ball?
Do you mean the player in the gray shirt near the front?
Yes
The player in the gray shirt (wearing red shoes) is dribbling the ball.
<video>Who is sitting on the right?
Do you mean the outdoor bench scene or the gym sequence?
outdoor bench
The man wearing a sleeveless top and bandana is sitting on the right.
<video>Did he score?
Which player do you mean — the close-up labeled 'Patrik Schick' or someone else?
the close-up labeled Schick
Yes — Patrik Schick scored.
<video>Who is putting?
Do you mean the woman in white or the woman in the floral dress?
the woman in the floral dress
The woman in the floral dress is putting.
<video>Is she holding the putter upright?
Which woman do you mean — the instructor in purple or the woman in blue?
the instructor in purple
Yes — the instructor in purple holds the putter upright before placing it down.
<video>Which foot is forward in the lunge?
Do you mean the frame labeled 'Balestra'?
Yes
Left foot is forward.
<video>Are the teammates catching or tossing the flyer?
Which moment — when she's up high or when she's on the ground?
when she's up high
They are catching her.
<video>Who is jumping in the sequence?
Do you mean the person jumping highest above others or the one taking a small hop?
the person jumping highest
The player in the dark/gray shirt who vaults high near the hoop.
<video>What color are his shorts?
Do you mean when he's sitting poolside or when he's swimming in the pool?
sitting poolside
Red
<video>Who performs the lateral drop?
Do you mean the wrestler in the yellow shirt or the black shirt?
yellow shirt
The wrestler in the yellow shirt performs the lateral drop.
<video>Who takes the shot?
Do you mean the taller player in white shorts or the shorter player in dark shorts?
shorter player in dark shorts
The shorter player in dark shorts (gray shirt) takes the shot/dunk.
<video>Is he dribbling the ball or shooting it?
Do you mean the moment when he's near the hoop?
Near the hoop
He shoots the ball at the hoop and makes the basket (ball goes through the rim).
<video>Which team scored?
Do you mean the sequence where the players in blue celebrate?
Yes — blue
The blue team scored.
<video>Is the skateboard orange?
Do you mean the deck (board surface) or the wheels?
deck
Yes — the skateboard deck is orange.
<video>Is the rider airborne?
Do you mean before takeoff, during the jump's peak, or after landing?
During the jump's peak
Yes — at the peak the rider is airborne with both wheels off the ground.
<video>What color are the shoes?
Do you mean the presenter in black or the player in red?
the presenter in black
Red.
<video>What number is on his jersey?
Which player do you mean — the one in the purple Lakers uniform or the white Suns uniform?
purple
<video>What color is the player's shirt?
Which player do you mean — the one near the camera or the one at the far side of the table?
the one near the camera
Black with yellow panels
<video>Who kicks the dummy?
Do you mean the man in the black beanie or the man in the orange shirt?
man in the black beanie
The man wearing a black tank top and black beanie kicks the dummy.
<video>Who is closest to the ball?
Do you mean at the moment just before the shot?
Just before the shot
The red player wearing number 7
<video>Who has the ball?
Do you mean earlier at the perimeter or later near the basket?
Later near the basket
A player in a red uniform (red team) has the ball near the basket.
<video>Which hand is pointing?
Do you mean the wide shot near the ball basket or the close-up facing the camera?
wide shot near the ball basket
His left hand.
<video>Who has 120 points?
Do you mean which team or which player?
team
LAC (Clippers)
<video>What is he holding?
Do you mean when he's at the address with the club, or when he's showing the towel with a pink tube?
when he's showing the towel with a pink tube
a towel with a pink tube
<video>Does the ball go into the goal?
Do you mean the sequence at the goalpost where he nudges the ball?
Yes — the goalpost sequence
Yes — the ball ends up inside the net.
<video>Is the player's serve overhand or underhand?
Do you mean the serve when he tosses the ball above his head?
Yes — toss above head
Overhand
<video>Who is holding the racket?
Do you mean the player near the bottom (foreground) of the court?
Yes
The player near the bottom of the court (wearing a maroon shirt) is holding the racket.
<video>Who dives to stop the ball?
Do you mean the early dive or the later dive near the goal?
the later dive near the goal
The goalkeeper in black near the goal (female goalkeeper) dives to stop the ball.
<video>Who ends up on the ground?
Do you mean the red player or the blue player?
blue
The blue player ends up on the ground (blue team player is lying down).
<video>What color is his shirt?
Do you mean at the very start or in the park scenes?
in the park scenes
Green
<video>Is he on the bike after the flip?
Do you mean while airborne or after landing?
after landing
Yes — he remains on the bike and rides away after landing.
<video>Is he grinding the rail?
Do you mean the green handrail or the red curb earlier?
green handrail
Yes — he ollies onto and slides along the green handrail.
<video>Is the rider airborne?
Do you mean during the jump or after landing?
during the jump
Yes — the rider is airborne during the jump.
<video>Is the snowmobile airborne?
Do you mean when it passes the 'FINISH' sign or later during the jump?
later during the jump
Yes — later in the sequence the snowmobile is clearly airborne.
<video>What color is the board?
Do you mean the board's top/deck or its underside?
deck
Light green (greenish-yellow) on the deck
<video>Is the ball on the white line?
Which ball — the one by the man standing at center?
The ball by the man at center.
Yes — the ball by the man at center is on the white line.
<video>Is the skater spinning or jumping?
Do you mean the skater nearest the camera?
Yes — nearest the camera.
Spinning on one foot.
<video>Who is scoring?
Do you mean the scoring moment with the red player by the posts, or the one with a light/white shirt?
the red player by the posts
The red-shirted player by the posts is scoring.
<video>Is he smiling?
Which person do you mean — the coach on the field or the batter in the nets?
the coach
Yes — the coach is smiling in several frames while speaking and gesturing.
<video>Who is holding the ball?
Do you mean the coach in black or a player?
The coach.
The coach is holding the ball.
<video>Who scored the goal?
Do you mean which team scored or which player?
Which team
Buffalo
<video>Who is holding the tablet?
Do you mean the person in the black shirt or the blue shirt?
the person in the black shirt
The man wearing the black shirt is holding the tablet.
<video>Is someone airborne?
Do you mean during the group toss early on or during the tumbling later?
during the tumbling
Yes — during the tumbling near the end a gymnast is airborne performing a flip.
<video>Which player takes the corner?
Do you mean the player who places the ball or the one who actually kicks it?
the one who kicks it
The player in white wearing jersey number 23 (the one who runs past the flag) kicks the corner.
<video>Is he running or being tackled?
Which player/time do you mean — the one moving right toward the camera, or the one on the ground?
the one moving right toward camera
He is running (moving right toward the camera while holding the ball).
<video>Did it land in the circle?
Do you mean the person or the parachute?
the person
Yes — the person lands inside the white circle.
<video>What color is his shirt?
Which rider do you mean — the one in blue, green, or yellow?
the one in blue
Blue
<video>Did he score?
Which 'he'—the penalty taker or the goalkeeper?
the penalty taker
Yes — the penalty taker scored (ball goes into the net).
<video>Who is holding the paddle?
Do you mean in the beach interview scene or in the surfing footage?
Beach interview
The woman on the far right of the beach (wearing sunglasses and a brown hat) is holding the paddle.
<video>What is in his left hand?
Do you mean before he tosses the ball for the serve or after he hits it?
Before he tosses the ball
A tennis ball.
<video>What does the player do with the ball?
Do you mean at the start of the sequence or later when he's running?
At the start
He throws a pass.
<video>Does he hit the ball?
Do you mean during the swing sequence (when the club strikes)?
Yes, during the swing
Yes — he hits the ball; it is visible airborne immediately after the strike.
<video>Did he score on that play?
Which player do you mean — the maroon player lying on the ground?
The maroon player on the ground.
No — he did not score; the score remained 0-0.
<video>Does he land the trick?
Do you mean at the end of the clip?
At the end.
Yes — at the end he lands the trick and rides away.
<video>Is he smiling?
Do you mean earlier or later in the sequence?
later
Yes — later in the sequence he is smiling.
<video>Is he serving or explaining?
Do you mean when he tosses and swings or when he's standing and talking?
during toss
He's serving.
<video>Who is holding the microphone?
Do you mean the shirtless boy or the blond child?
shirtless boy
The shirtless boy is holding the microphone.
<video>Who is holding the ball?
Do you mean when they first stand together or during the drill?
during the drill
The player in the green 'BOSTON' jersey (number 11).
<video>Who scored the touchdown?
Which touchdown do you mean?
The one labeled 'D. PEOPLES-JONES'.
D. PEOPLES-JONES
<video>Who is celebrating in the clip?
Do you mean the player in white or the player in black?
the player in white
The player in white (wearing number 14) is celebrating.
<video>Who advances toward the other?
Do you mean the person in the black shirt or the blue shirt?
black shirt
The person in the black shirt advances toward the other.
<video>Who is in the middle?
Do you mean the middle person among the three girls?
Middle girl
The girl wearing a tie-dye shirt and blue shorts.
<video>Which ball goes into the pocket?
Do you mean the red ball near the lower-left or the yellow ball nearer the center?
the red ball near the lower-left
The red ball near the lower-left pocket falls into the left corner pocket.
<video>What color is the player's jersey?
Which player do you mean — the one in blue or the one in yellow?
the one in yellow
Yellow
<video>What color is his shirt?
Which person do you mean — the coach holding the ball or the tall player standing left?
the coach
red
<video>Did the ball go into the pocket?
Which ball do you mean — the yellow ball or the white cue ball?
the yellow ball
Yes — the yellow ball is pocketed.
<video>Who is holding the sword?
Do you mean the man in the center or one of the fencers?
the man in the center
The man in the center — wearing a dark jacket — is holding the sword (blue-handled weapon).
<video>What does he do next?
Which "he" — the blonde wrestler or the long black-haired wrestler?
the blonde wrestler
He lifts the long black-haired wrestler onto his shoulders and slams him down, leaving him stunned on the floor.
<video>Who is juggling the ball?
Do you mean the person on the left or the right?
right
The person on the right — the man wearing the orange shirt.
<video>Which foot performs the toe tap?
Do you mean the close-up of the white/neon shoe tapping the ball?
Yes, that close-up.
Right foot.
<video>Is he dribbling in this scene?
Which person do you mean — the man in front or the player on the screen?
player on the screen
Yes — the player on the TV screen is dribbling the basketball.
<video>Did he head the ball?
Which player do you mean — the jumping gray player or the orange attacker?
jumping gray player
Yes — the jumping gray player headed the ball.
<video>Who is winning?
Which game's scoreboard do you mean?
Cavs vs Warriors
Cavaliers leading 38–34.
<video>Who finished first?
Do you mean who finished first on the scoreboard shown?
Yes, on the scoreboard.
Colton Farquer — 9.05
<video>Is he wearing a hat?
Which person — the man on the couch or the kayaker?
the man on the couch
Yes — he is wearing a light grey cap.
<video>Who is holding her feet?
Do you mean the top girl's feet?
Top girl's feet
Three bases are holding the top girl's feet: the left base in black (crop top), the center base in black (with number), and the right base in red.
<video>What is red in the scene?
Do you mean the sail, the rider's clothing, or the logo?
the sail
The sail — its frame/trim and some panels are bright red.
<video>Is he wearing yellow shoes?
Do you mean the player on the field or the man at the table?
player on the field
Yes — the player on the field is wearing yellow shoes.
<video>Is the skater jumping or spinning?
Do you mean the moment when her feet are off the ice (airborne)?
airborne
Jumping — she is airborne with her feet off the ice.
<video>Is she smiling?
Do you mean at the start of the video or in the middle?
start
Yes — she is smiling at the start of the video.
<video>Is the sail red?
Do you mean the large sail the person is holding or the small sails in the background?
the large sail the person is holding
Yes — the sail the person is holding is an orange-red color.
<video>Does he leave the frame?
Do you mean at any point during the clip or by the final frame?
by the final frame
Yes — by the final frame he is off-screen.
<video>Who is smiling?
Do you mean the man in the black cap near the camera or the man sitting on the floor?
the man in the black cap
The man in the black cap is smiling.
<video>Does he fall?
Do you mean the outdoor ramp segment or the indoor bowl segment?
outdoor ramp
Yes — in the outdoor ramp segment he falls and is lying on the ramp afterwards.
<video>What move is the standing wrestler performing?
Do you mean the moment he lifts the opponent upside-down in the middle frames?
Yes
A German suplex — he lifts the opponent upside-down and throws them backward into a bridged suplex.
<video>Which hand is holding the paddle?
Do you mean before or after he tosses the ball?
Before he tosses it
Right hand
<video>Does he land the trick?
Do you mean immediately after the jump or after he rides away?
after he rides away
Yes — he lands and rides away.
<video>Is the cyclist sitting or standing?
Which moment — earlier or later in the sequence?
later
Standing (the rider is out of the saddle in the later frames).
<video>Who hits the ball?
Do you mean the person near the net or the player at the back?
the player at the back
The player at the back (wearing a white shirt) hits the ball.
<video>Who shoots?
Do you mean the player who jumps near the basket and releases the shot?
Yes — the player jumping at the hoop.
The blue-team player who jumps near the basket and releases the shot (the jumper by the hoop).
<video>Which hand is he holding the ball with?
Do you mean while dribbling or at the shot release?
at release
Right hand
<video>Who falls to the ground?
Do you mean the person on the left or the right?
right
The person on the right falls to the ground.
<video>Is he putting the shoe on?
Do you mean when he handles the shoe on the skateboard or when he wears it?
places it on the skateboard
No — he's placing the shoe on the skateboard (removing it from his foot).
<video>What color are the shoes?
Do you mean the player in the white top or the other player near the goal?
player in white top
Light grey / white
<video>Is he demonstrating a forehand or a backhand?
Do you mean the earlier two-handed motion or the later one-handed swing?
the later one-handed swing
Forehand
<video>Which serve is that?
Do you mean caption 1, 2, 3, or 4?
1) Normal Underarm Serve
<video>Who is in first?
Do you mean the leaderboard or the race position?
leaderboard
windVOW8820
<video>What color is the stone closest to the center?
Do you mean the stone in the red house (center) or the stone on the blue ring?
stone in the red house
red
<video>Who is being grabbed in the ring?
Do you mean the bald wrestler or the long-haired wrestler?
the long-haired wrestler
The long-haired wrestler is being grabbed.
<video>Is the skater jumping or spinning?
Which skater do you mean — the one in purple near center or the person passing in front?
the one in purple near center
Spinning on one foot (a spiral/one-foot spin).
<video>Which rail should you try to keep pressure on?
Do you mean upwind or leeward?
upwind
Upwind rail.
<video>Who takes the shot?
Which moment do you mean — the final jump shot near the basket?
final jump shot
The player in white (left) takes the final jump shot.
<video>Did he score?
Which player do you mean — the jumper heading the ball or the goalkeeper?
the jumper
No — the jumper did not score; his header was cleared/held by the goalkeeper.
<video>Who scored the dunk?
Do you mean the player or the team?
player
The player in the white Raptors jersey number 24.
<video>Which ball goes through the wicket?
Do you mean the blue ball or the orange ball?
the blue ball
The blue ball goes through the wicket.
<video>Is he dribbling or passing?
Which clip do you mean — the close-up with the '2 TOUCHES' text?
Yes, that clip.
Dribbling.
<video>Did he land the trick?
Which skater — the one in the black hoodie in front or the one behind?
the one in the black hoodie in front
Yes — the skater in the black hoodie lands the trick and rides away.
<video>Is the rider standing on the horse?
Do you mean at the beginning or later when she rides near the torches?
later
Yes — later in the video (near the torches/center) the rider is standing on the horse.
<video>Who is holding the other down?
Do you mean the bald man sitting on the mat?
Yes
The bald man in black (sitting on the mat) is holding the other wrestler down.
<video>Is he kneeling or standing?
Do you mean the earlier clip where he's on his knees or the later clip where he's upright?
the later clip (upright)
He is standing.
<video>Who lifts the flyer?
Do you mean the adult in the dark jacket or the teammate in purple?
adult in dark jacket
The adult in the dark jacket lifts the flyer.
<video>Which foot is aligned towards the ball?
Do you mean the coach's foot or the batsman's foot?
coach's foot
The coach's front foot is aligned towards the ball.
<video>Is he wearing a hat?
Do you mean the opening close-up or the lesson on the range?
The lesson on the range
Yes — during the lesson on the range he wears a white visor.
<video>Where does he put the ball?
Which ball do you mean — the medicine ball or a golf ball?
medicine ball
He lets the medicine ball fall to the ground in front of him, near his right foot.
<video>Are her arms raised?
Do you mean at the start (standing) or while she jumps?
while she jumps
Yes — during the jump her arms are raised above her head.
<video>What is she doing?
Do you mean the acrobatic move where she arches backward and kicks her legs over?
Yes, the backward arch kick-over
Back walkover (she arches back, places hands, then kicks over to stand).
<video>Which ball is he aiming at?
Do you mean the solitary blue ball or the cluster of red balls?
the blue ball
He is aiming at the blue ball.
<video>What is he holding?
Do you mean when he's leaning forward or when he's standing upright?
leaning forward
a paddle
<video>Is he moving toward the camera?
Do you mean at the beginning or later in the video?
the beginning
No — at the beginning he is moving away from the camera.
<video>Who is holding the ball?
Do you mean at the start or at the end of the sequence?
at the start
The coach (man in the grey shirt and blue pants) is holding the ball.
<video>Did she perform a flip?
Which person — the sitting girl or the background girl?
the sitting girl
Yes — the sitting girl does a cartwheel/handspring sequence (flips) and lands standing.
<video>Who raises an arm after the shot?
Which person — the close-up man or a player on the ice?
the close-up man
The man shown in the close-up raises his arm.
<video>Who ends up on his back?
Do you mean the bald man or the dark-haired man?
bald man
The bald man ends up on his back.
<video>Does it land inside the circle?
Do you mean the person (paraglider) or the canopy/parachute?
person
Yes — the paraglider (person) lands inside the painted circle.
<video>Did she perform a cartwheel or a roundoff?
Which athlete do you mean — the one running from the right?
The athlete running from the right.
Roundoff.
<video>Does he land the trick?
Which trick do you mean — the jump over the gap or the ledge trick?
the jump over the gap
Yes — he lands the jump over the gap and rides away.
<video>Is he airborne?
Do you mean at the start of the video or later?
later
Yes — later frames show him airborne above the cliff with the paraglider.
<video>Who is in the car?
Do you mean the driver or the passenger?
driver
The white man wearing a white polo (sitting on the left — the driver).
<video>Who scored?
Do you mean the touchdown or the extra point?
the extra point
Sarah Fuller
<video>Is he smiling?
Which man do you mean — the one close to camera or the one running with the kite?
the one close to camera
Yes, he is smiling.
<video>Did he hit the ball over the net?
Which player do you mean — the one near the bottom or the one near the top of the frame?
the player near the bottom
Yes — the player near the bottom hit the ball over the net.
<video>Does he dunk the ball?
Which person do you mean by 'he' — the man in uniform running with the ball?
Yes, the man in uniform.
Yes — the man in uniform dunks the ball into the hoop.
<video>Did he clear it?
Which object do you mean — the white wall or the steps?
white wall
Yes — he jumps over and clears the white wall.
<video>Did she land the jump?
Which jump do you mean?
The double lutz
Yes — she lands the double lutz and continues skating.
<video>Did he score?
Which player do you mean — the one in blue or the one in white?
the one in blue
Yes — the blue player scores; the ball goes through the hoop.
<video>Who is performing the aerial move?
Do you mean the clip labeled 'Neville'?
Yes
Neville
<video>What color is the runner's uniform?
Which runner do you mean — the leader or another runner?
the leading runner
red
<video>What number is shown in the blue circle?
Do you mean the first blue circular title card shown?
first one
<video>Which hand is on her hip?
Do you mean when she's standing by the boards?
Yes, when she's by the boards.
Her right hand.
<video>Who is inside the yellow circle?
Do you mean the pre-snap yellow circle on the right side of the field?
Yes
A three-man offensive group — three offensive players lined up tightly on the right side (circled).
<video>What color is his hat?
Which person do you mean — the coach or the player?
the coach
Red
<video>Does the person land on the board?
Which person do you mean — the red-sailed or the green-sailed windsurfer?
red-sailed
Yes — the red-sailed windsurfer lands back on the board.
<video>Who is holding the ball?
Do you mean the player on the right side about to shoot?
The one on the right about to shoot.
The dark-uniformed player on the right (wearing number 4) who is about to shoot.
<video>What's behind him?
Do you mean the studio background or the tennis-court footage?
studio monitor
A TV monitor showing the Wimbledon menu (Order of Play, Draw, Seedings, Players, Analysis).
<video>Who has the ball?
Do you mean the player wearing #21 or #25?
Player number 21 has the ball.
<video>Does she fall?
Do you mean at any point in the clip or only at the end?
at any point
Yes — midway through she tumbles and hits the ice (visible fall).
<video>Is the windsurfer on water or on the beach?
Do you mean the early water shots or the later beach shots?
the later beach shots
He is on the beach (standing on sand).
<video>Which way is she facing?
Do you mean at the start or at the end of the video?
start
She is facing left.
<video>Who performs the dunk?
Do you mean the earlier dunk or the final dunk near the end?
the final dunk
Anthony Davis
<video>Is she jumping or spinning?
Do you mean the airborne move or the in-place rotation?
airborne
Jumping (an airborne jump)
<video>Does he land the jump?
Do you mean at the end of the clip after the trick?
Yes, at the end.
Yes — he lands and rides away from the ramp.
<video>Does he swing the club?
Which man — the one in yellow or the one in blue?
the man in blue
Yes — the man in blue swings the club.
<video>Is the ball in the goal?
Do you mean immediately after his kick near the end of the sequence?
immediately after his kick
Yes — immediately after his kick the ball is in the goal (visible inside the net).
<video>Is she jumping?
Do you mean the frame where both skates are off the ice?
Yes
Yes — in that frame she is airborne with both skates off the ice (a jump).
<video>Does he spin while in the air?
Do you mean the rider's body or the bike frame?
the bike frame
No — the bike frame does not spin while airborne.
<video>Does he score?
Which player do you mean — the red shooter near the rim or the white defender?
the red shooter
Yes — the red shooter scores (makes the basket).
<video>What did he jump over?
Do you mean the skater who jumps near the rail or someone else?
the skater near the rail
He jumped over the graffiti-covered set of stairs next to the rail.
<video>Is she holding it?
Do you mean the foam roller or her feet?
her feet
Yes — she is holding her feet.
<video>Is the boat pink?
Do you mean the boat by the waterfall or the red/orange one?
The one by the waterfall.
Yes — the kayak by the waterfall is pink.
<video>Who is facing up on the mat?
Do you mean in the final frames of the sequence?
final frames
The long-haired wrestler sitting upright (the wrestler on top) is facing up in the final frames.
<video>Who ends up with the ball?
Do you mean who has it in the final frame of the clip?
Final frame
